gr.interamerican.bo2.gui.util
Class BPanelFactory

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.gui.util.BPanelFactory

public class BPanelFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Factory that creates BPanel objects from a properties file.
The properties file must obligatory have the following properties:

panelType Fully qualified class name of the BPanel sub-type that will be instantiated
panelType Fully qualified class name of the panel's model type
The rest properties are copied to the model object. Then a panel is created with the specified model.

Method Detail

create

public static <T,P extends BPanel<T>> P create(java.util.Properties properties)
Creates a new BPanel from a properties file.
The properties file must have the following property set.
  • panelType : Fully qualified class name of the panel's class
    • The method instantiates the panel using create(Class). Then it uses JavaBeanUtils#copyFromProperties(Properties, Object) to modify the panel's model with the values from the specified properties object.

    Type Parameters:
    P - Type of panel.
    T - Type of model.
    Parameters:
    properties - Properties object specifying the panel and model types and the model object's property values.
    Returns:
    Returns a new panel with a model created according to the the specified properties.

    create

    public static <T,P extends BPanel<T>> P create(java.lang.Class<P> panelType)
    Creates a new BPanel of the specified type.
    The factory method uses GenericsUtils to find the class of this panel type's model. Then a model object is instantiated by Factory. The panel is created using the constructor that takes the model as argument. If no such constructor exists, then a RuntimeException is thrown.

    Type Parameters:
    P - Type of panel.
    T - Type of model.
    Parameters:
    panelType - Type of panel.
    Returns:
    Returns a new panel with a model of the specified class.

    create

    public static <T,P extends BPanel<T>> P create(java.lang.Class<P> panelType,
                                               T model)
    Creates a new BPanel of the specified type.
    The panel is created using the constructor that takes the model as argument. If no such constructor exists, then a RuntimeException is thrown.

    Type Parameters:
    P - Type of panel.
    T - Type of model.
    Parameters:
    panelType - Type of panel.
    model - Model of the specified panel type.
    Returns:
    Returns a new panel with a model of the specified class.

    getModelClass

    Type Parameters:
    T -
    P -
    Parameters:
    panelClass -
    Returns:
    Returns the model class of the specified panel type.
